meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6998.

td.p: MaryLou McKenna, a high school math teacher from Harwich, Massachusetts
Eric Hack, a high school Latin teacher from Cape Charles, Virginia
Tracy Alexander, a high school AP Language teacher from Tucson, Arizona

tr.td: APPLE IDIOMS FOR TEACHER
CRIME & LAW ENFORCEMENT
BROADWAY MUSICALS BY SONG
(Alex: We'll give you the songs.)
"C"OUNTRIES
BIRDS WITHIN WORDS
TELL 'EM WHAT THEY'VE WON, JOHNNY!
[Johnny Gilbert delivers all the clues in this category.]

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'To compare 2 things that are essentially different is to compare these')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: To compare 2 things that are essentially different is to compare these

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_3', 'clue_J_2_3_stuck', '(Eric: I should know this. Um, what is a vigil...a vigil... oh!)
[The time\'s-up signal sounds.]
(Alex: Sorry.)
(MaryLou: What is [*]?)
(Alex: Yes. Eric was having trouble getting it out before he ran out of time.)
...
(Eric Hack\'s students at Broadwater Academy: Good luck, Mr. Hack! [Cheering])

vigilante

EricMaryLou
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_5', 'clue_J_3_5_stuck', '(MaryLou: What is... oh... it\'s the... [whispers] "Rock"...)
(Alex: Say something.)
(MaryLou: Oh, I\'m sorry, I\'m blanking.)
(Alex: Oh, you weren\'t blanking. It\'s [*].)
(MaryLou: I knew it was "Rock".)
(Alex: Oh well. Boo hiss. You\'re at $1,000. We have three clues left to deal with.)

Rock of Ages

MaryLou
')

Eric
MaryLou

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Tracy
Eric
MaryLou
THEY SAID IT
THE NATIONAL INVENTORS HALL OF FAME
SOLVE THE MYSTERY TITLE
THAT'S ANCIENT CITY HISTORY
YOUR TV CHARACTER IS DEAD TO ME
THE MI"DD"LE
(Alex: There will be 2 "D"s in the middle of each correct response.)
